00058 static void copyData(ModifierData *md, ModifierData *target)
00059 {
00060     MaskModifierData *mmd = (MaskModifierData*) md;
00061     MaskModifierData *tmmd = (MaskModifierData*) target;
00062     
00063     BLI_strncpy(tmmd->vgroup, mmd->vgroup, sizeof(tmmd->vgroup));
00064     tmmd->flag = mmd->flag;
00065 }
00066 
00067 static CustomDataMask requiredDataMask(Object *UNUSED(ob), ModifierData *UNUSED(md))
00068 {
00069     return CD_MASK_MDEFORMVERT;
00070 }
00071 
00072 static void foreachObjectLink(
00073                           ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00074        void (*walk)(void *userData, Object *ob, Object **obpoin),
00075           void *userData)
00076 {
00077     MaskModifierData *mmd = (MaskModifierData *)md;
00078     walk(userData, ob, &mmd->ob_arm);
00079 }
00080 
00081 static void updateDepgraph(ModifierData *md, DagForest *forest,
00082                         struct Scene *UNUSED(scene),
00083                         Object *UNUSED(ob),
00084                         DagNode *obNode)
00085 {
00086     MaskModifierData *mmd = (MaskModifierData *)md;
00087 
00088     if (mmd->ob_arm) {
00089         DagNode *armNode = dag_get_node(forest, mmd->ob_arm);
00090         
00091         dag_add_relation(forest, armNode, obNode, DAG_RL_DATA_DATA | DAG_RL_OB_DATA, "Mask Modifier");
00092     }
00093 }
00094 
00095 static DerivedMesh *applyModifier(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00096                         DerivedMesh *derivedData,
00097                         int UNUSED(useRenderParams),
00098                         int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00099 {
00100     MaskModifierData *mmd= (MaskModifierData *)md;
00101     DerivedMesh *dm= derivedData, *result= NULL;
00102     GHash *vertHash=NULL, *edgeHash, *polyHash;
00103     GHashIterator *hashIter;
00104     MDeformVert *dvert= NULL, *dv;
00105     int numPolys=0, numLoops=0, numEdges=0, numVerts=0;
00106     int maxVerts, maxEdges, maxPolys;
00107     int i;
00108 
00109     MPoly *mpoly;
00110     MLoop *mloop;
00111 
00112     MPoly *mpoly_new;
00113     MLoop *mloop_new;
00114     MEdge *medge_new;
00115     MVert *mvert_new;
00116 
00117 
00118     int *loop_mapping;
00119 
00120     /* Overview of Method:
00121      *  1. Get the vertices that are in the vertexgroup of interest 
00122      *  2. Filter out unwanted geometry (i.e. not in vertexgroup), by populating mappings with new vs old indices
00123      *  3. Make a new mesh containing only the mapping data
00124      */
00125     
00126     /* get original number of verts, edges, and faces */
00127     maxVerts= dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00128     maxEdges= dm->getNumEdges(dm);
00129     maxPolys= dm->getNumPolys(dm);
00130     
00131     /* check if we can just return the original mesh 
00132      *  - must have verts and therefore verts assigned to vgroups to do anything useful
00133      */
00134     if ( !(ELEM(mmd->mode, MOD_MASK_MODE_ARM, MOD_MASK_MODE_VGROUP)) ||
00135          (maxVerts == 0) || (ob->defbase.first == NULL) )
00136     {
00137         return derivedData;
00138     }
00139     
00140     /* if mode is to use selected armature bones, aggregate the bone groups */
00141     if (mmd->mode == MOD_MASK_MODE_ARM) { /* --- using selected bones --- */
00142         GHash *vgroupHash;
00143         Object *oba= mmd->ob_arm;
00144         bPoseChannel *pchan;
00145         bDeformGroup *def;
00146         char *bone_select_array;
00147         int bone_select_tot= 0;
00148         const int defbase_tot= BLI_countlist(&ob->defbase);
00149 
00150         /* check that there is armature object with bones to use, otherwise return original mesh */
00151         if (ELEM3(NULL, mmd->ob_arm, mmd->ob_arm->pose, ob->defbase.first))
00152             return derivedData;
00153 
00154         bone_select_array= MEM_mallocN(defbase_tot * sizeof(char), "mask array");
00155 
00156         for (i = 0, def = ob->defbase.first; def; def = def->next, i++) {
00157             pchan = get_pose_channel(oba->pose, def->name);
00158             if (pchan && pchan->bone && (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED)) {
00159                 bone_select_array[i]= TRUE;
00160                 bone_select_tot++;
00161             }
00162             else {
00163                 bone_select_array[i]= FALSE;
00164             }
00165         }
00166 
00167         /* hashes for finding mapping of:
00168          *  - vgroups to indices -> vgroupHash  (string, int)
00169          *  - bones to vgroup indices -> boneHash (index of vgroup, dummy)
00170          */
00171         vgroupHash= BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_strhash, BLI_ghashutil_strcmp, "mask vgroup gh");
00172         
00173         /* build mapping of names of vertex groups to indices */
00174         for (i = 0, def = ob->defbase.first; def; def = def->next, i++) 
00175             BLI_ghash_insert(vgroupHash, def->name, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i));
00176         
00177         /* if no bones selected, free hashes and return original mesh */
00178         if (bone_select_tot == 0) {
00179             BLI_ghash_free(vgroupHash, NULL, NULL);
00180             MEM_freeN(bone_select_array);
00181             
00182             return derivedData;
00183         }
00184         
00185         /* repeat the previous check, but for dverts */
00186         dvert= dm->getVertDataArray(dm, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
00187         if (dvert == NULL) {
00188             BLI_ghash_free(vgroupHash, NULL, NULL);
00189             MEM_freeN(bone_select_array);
00190             
00191             return derivedData;
00192         }
00193         
00194         /* hashes for quickly providing a mapping from old to new - use key=oldindex, value=newindex */
00195         vertHash= BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_inthash, BLI_ghashutil_intcmp, "mask vert gh");
00196         
00197         /* add vertices which exist in vertexgroups into vertHash for filtering */
00198         for (i= 0, dv= dvert; i < maxVerts; i++, dv++)
00199         {
00200             MDeformWeight *dw= dv->dw;
00201             int j;
00202 
00203             for (j= dv->totweight; j > 0; j--, dw++) {
00204                 if (dw->def_nr < defbase_tot) {
00205                     if (bone_select_array[dw->def_nr]) {
00206                         if (dw->weight != 0.0f) {
00207                             break;
00208                         }
00209                     }
00210                 }
00211             }
00212             
00213             /* check if include vert in vertHash */
00214             if (mmd->flag & MOD_MASK_INV) {
00215                 /* if this vert is in the vgroup, don't include it in vertHash */
00216                 if (dw) continue;
00217             }
00218             else {
00219                 /* if this vert isn't in the vgroup, don't include it in vertHash */
00220                 if (!dw) continue;
00221             }
00222             
00223             /* add to ghash for verts (numVerts acts as counter for mapping) */
00224             BLI_ghash_insert(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i), SET_INT_IN_POINTER(numVerts));
00225             numVerts++;
00226         }
00227         
00228         /* free temp hashes */
00229         BLI_ghash_free(vgroupHash, NULL, NULL);
00230         MEM_freeN(bone_select_array);
00231     }
00232     else        /* --- Using Nominated VertexGroup only --- */ 
00233     {
00234         int defgrp_index = defgroup_name_index(ob, mmd->vgroup);
00235         
00236         /* get dverts */
00237         if (defgrp_index >= 0)
00238             dvert = dm->getVertDataArray(dm, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
00239             
00240         /* if no vgroup (i.e. dverts) found, return the initial mesh */
00241         if ((defgrp_index < 0) || (dvert == NULL))
00242             return dm;
00243             
00244         /* hashes for quickly providing a mapping from old to new - use key=oldindex, value=newindex */
00245         vertHash= BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_inthash, BLI_ghashutil_intcmp, "mask vert2 bh");
00246         
00247         /* add vertices which exist in vertexgroup into ghash for filtering */
00248         for (i= 0, dv= dvert; i < maxVerts; i++, dv++)
00249         {
00250             const int weight_set= defvert_find_weight(dv, defgrp_index) != 0.0f;
00251             
00252             /* check if include vert in vertHash */
00253             if (mmd->flag & MOD_MASK_INV) {
00254                 /* if this vert is in the vgroup, don't include it in vertHash */
00255                 if (weight_set) continue;
00256             }
00257             else {
00258                 /* if this vert isn't in the vgroup, don't include it in vertHash */
00259                 if (!weight_set) continue;
00260             }
00261             
00262             /* add to ghash for verts (numVerts acts as counter for mapping) */
00263             BLI_ghash_insert(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i), SET_INT_IN_POINTER(numVerts));
00264             numVerts++;
00265         }
00266     }
00267 
00268     /* hashes for quickly providing a mapping from old to new - use key=oldindex, value=newindex */
00269     edgeHash= BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_inthash, BLI_ghashutil_intcmp, "mask ed2 gh");
00270     polyHash= BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_inthash, BLI_ghashutil_intcmp, "mask fa2 gh");
00271     
00272     mpoly = dm->getPolyArray(dm);
00273     mloop = dm->getLoopArray(dm);
00274 
00275     loop_mapping = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int) * maxPolys, "mask loopmap"); /* overalloc, assume all polys are seen */
00276 
00277     /* loop over edges and faces, and do the same thing to 
00278      * ensure that they only reference existing verts 
00279      */
00280     for (i = 0; i < maxEdges; i++) 
00281     {
00282         MEdge me;
00283         dm->getEdge(dm, i, &me);
00284         
00285         /* only add if both verts will be in new mesh */
00286         if ( BLI_ghash_haskey(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(me.v1)) &&
00287              BLI_ghash_haskey(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(me.v2)) )
00288         {
00289             BLI_ghash_insert(edgeHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i), SET_INT_IN_POINTER(numEdges));
00290             numEdges++;
00291         }
00292     }
00293     for (i = 0; i < maxPolys; i++)
00294     {
00295         MPoly *mp = &mpoly[i];
00296         MLoop *ml = mloop + mp->loopstart;
00297         int ok = TRUE;
00298         int j;
00299 
00300         for (j = 0; j < mp->totloop; j++, ml++) {
00301             if (!BLI_ghash_haskey(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(ml->v))) {
00302                 ok = FALSE;
00303                 break;
00304             }
00305         }
00306         
00307         /* all verts must be available */
00308         if (ok) {
00309             BLI_ghash_insert(polyHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i), SET_INT_IN_POINTER(numPolys));
00310             loop_mapping[numPolys] = numLoops;
00311             numPolys++;
00312             numLoops += mp->totloop;
00313         }
00314     }
00315     
00316     
00317     /* now we know the number of verts, edges and faces, 
00318      * we can create the new (reduced) mesh
00319      */
00320     result = CDDM_from_template(dm, numVerts, numEdges, 0, numLoops, numPolys);
00321     
00322     mpoly_new = CDDM_get_polys(result);
00323     mloop_new = CDDM_get_loops(result);
00324     medge_new = CDDM_get_edges(result);
00325     mvert_new = CDDM_get_verts(result);
00326     
00327     /* using ghash-iterators, map data into new mesh */
00328         /* vertices */
00329     for ( hashIter = BLI_ghashIterator_new(vertHash);
00330           !BLI_ghashIterator_isDone(hashIter);
00331           BLI_ghashIterator_step(hashIter) ) 
00332     {
00333         MVert source;
00334         MVert *dest;
00335         int oldIndex = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghashIterator_getKey(hashIter));
00336         int newIndex = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghashIterator_getValue(hashIter));
00337         
00338         dm->getVert(dm, oldIndex, &source);
00339         dest = &mvert_new[newIndex];
00340         
00341         DM_copy_vert_data(dm, result, oldIndex, newIndex, 1);
00342         *dest = source;
00343     }
00344     BLI_ghashIterator_free(hashIter);
00345         
00346         /* edges */
00347     for ( hashIter = BLI_ghashIterator_new(edgeHash);
00348           !BLI_ghashIterator_isDone(hashIter);
00349           BLI_ghashIterator_step(hashIter) ) 
00350     {
00351         MEdge source;
00352         MEdge *dest;
00353         int oldIndex = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghashIterator_getKey(hashIter));
00354         int newIndex = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghashIterator_getValue(hashIter));
00355         
00356         dm->getEdge(dm, oldIndex, &source);
00357         dest = &medge_new[newIndex];
00358         
00359         source.v1 = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghash_lookup(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(source.v1)));
00360         source.v2 = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghash_lookup(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(source.v2)));
00361         
00362         DM_copy_edge_data(dm, result, oldIndex, newIndex, 1);
00363         *dest = source;
00364     }
00365     BLI_ghashIterator_free(hashIter);
00366     
00367         /* faces */
00368     for ( hashIter = BLI_ghashIterator_new(polyHash);
00369           !BLI_ghashIterator_isDone(hashIter);
00370           BLI_ghashIterator_step(hashIter) ) 
00371     {
00372         int oldIndex = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghashIterator_getKey(hashIter));
00373         int newIndex = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghashIterator_getValue(hashIter));
00374         MPoly *source = &mpoly[oldIndex];
00375         MPoly *dest = &mpoly_new[newIndex];
00376         int oldLoopIndex = source->loopstart;
00377         int newLoopIndex = loop_mapping[newIndex];
00378         MLoop *source_loop = &mloop[oldLoopIndex];
00379         MLoop *dest_loop = &mloop_new[newLoopIndex];
00380         
00381         DM_copy_poly_data(dm, result, oldIndex, newIndex, 1);
00382         DM_copy_loop_data(dm, result, oldLoopIndex, newLoopIndex, source->totloop);
00383 
00384         *dest = *source;
00385         dest->loopstart = newLoopIndex;
00386         for (i = 0; i < source->totloop; i++) {
00387             dest_loop[i].v = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghash_lookup(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(source_loop[i].v)));
00388             dest_loop[i].e = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghash_lookup(edgeHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(source_loop[i].e)));
00389         }
00390     }
00391 
00392     BLI_ghashIterator_free(hashIter);
00393 
00394     MEM_freeN(loop_mapping);
00395 
00396     /* why is this needed? - campbell */
00397     /* recalculate normals */
00398     CDDM_calc_normals(result);
00399     
00400     /* free hashes */
00401     BLI_ghash_free(vertHash, NULL, NULL);
00402     BLI_ghash_free(edgeHash, NULL, NULL);
00403     BLI_ghash_free(polyHash, NULL, NULL);
00404 
00405     /* return the new mesh */
00406     return result;
00407 }

00410 ModifierTypeInfo modifierType_Mask = {
00411     /* name */              "Mask",
00412     /* structName */        "MaskModifierData",
00413     /* structSize */        sizeof(MaskModifierData),
00414     /* type */              eModifierTypeType_Nonconstructive,
00415     /* flags */             eModifierTypeFlag_AcceptsMesh|eModifierTypeFlag_SupportsMapping|eModifierTypeFlag_SupportsEditmode,
00416 
00417     /* copyData */          copyData,
00418     /* deformVerts */       NULL,
00419     /* deformMatrices */    NULL,
00420     /* deformVertsEM */     NULL,
00421     /* deformMatricesEM */  NULL,
00422     /* applyModifier */     applyModifier,
00423     /* applyModifierEM */   NULL,
00424     /* initData */          NULL,
00425     /* requiredDataMask */  requiredDataMask,
00426     /* freeData */          NULL,
00427     /* isDisabled */        NULL,
00428     /* updateDepgraph */    updateDepgraph,
00429     /* dependsOnTime */     NULL,
00430     /* dependsOnNormals */  NULL,
00431     /* foreachObjectLink */ foreachObjectLink,
00432     /* foreachIDLink */     NULL,
00433     /* foreachTexLink */    NULL,
00434 };
